participant_1.background:
My first purchase was a new teaching outfit to inspire my students to love their bodies as much as I love mine.
I love my family, but my pets are my best friends.
i am very social.
I'm really into learning new things and expanding my knowledge.
I sometimes forget to water my plants, but I'm trying to be better about it.

participant_2.background:
I have worked at my current job for two years and I am looking forward to moving to a new home in a quiet area where I can focus on my art.
i m obsessed with animals.
this summer i went on vacation to italy.
My favorite websites are Healthline and Eat This, Not That! because they provide evidence-based information about nutrition and healthy recipes.
during the week , i work as a barista.

content.text: Hey there!
Hi there! How are you today?
I'm doing great! I just got a new teaching job and I'm really excited about it.
That's awesome! Congratulations! What grade are you going to be teaching?
I'll be teaching kindergarten. I'm really excited to get to know my students and help them learn and grow.
That's great! I love kindergarten. It's such a fun age. I'm sure you're going to do a great job.
Thanks! I'm really looking forward to it.
I'm sure your students are going to love you.
I hope so!
Do you have any pets?
Yes, I have two dogs and a cat.
That's awesome! I love animals. I have a dog and a cat too.
What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever and a black lab.
Those are both great breeds! I love golden retrievers.
Me too! They're so friendly and loving.
What kind of cat do you have?
I have a tabby cat.
Those are great cats too! I love their personalities.
Me too! They're so playful and affectionate.
I'm glad to hear that you love animals. I think they're so important.
Me too! I think they make the world a better place.
